Description: Glazed composition shabti of Tesnakht daughter of Djedhor and Tasenenhor with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised hoe, an adze and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the back-pillar is inscribed with incised hieroglyphs; there is a plinth beneath the feet.
